title: SET_CUTSCENE_ENTITY_STREAMING_FLAGS
content:
0x4C61C75BEE8184C20x47DB08A9// SetCutsceneEntityStreamingFlags
void SET_CUTSCENE_ENTITY_STREAMING_FLAGS(char* cutsceneEntName, int p1, int p2);Parameters:cutsceneEntName: MP_1, MP_2, etcp1: Always 0 in R* scriptsp2: Always 1 in R* scriptsOnly used in networked environment with MP cutscenes
